Title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner app for the web in DOD
Description:
After further review we have decided not to proceed with this change at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. The new Microsoft Planner app for the web is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of Microsoft To Do and the collaboration of Planner into a simple, scalable, intelligent solution that spans from individual task management to enterprise and professional project management.
GA date: July CY2025
